Title: Sixty years of the great Chinese Communist Party 1921-1981
Notes: Part of a series marking the 60th anniversary of the CCP. Subtitled "Overthrow the Three Mountains and Establish the People's China" (推翻三座大山建立人民中国), this second part (of two) covers the "The Third Civil Revolutionary War Period 1945-1949" (第三次国内革命战争时期 1945-1949).It shows further scenes of the Civil War; Mao Zedong's speech marking the inauguration of the People's Republic (开国大典) in Beijing on 1 October 1949; the military part of that same speech, read by Zhu De and other commanders; the fall of the GMD government in Nanjing on 23 April 1949; and the military parade on Tiananmen Square on 1 October.
Theme: The Founding of the Chinese Communist Party (1921)1 October, National Day of the People's Republic of ChinaZhu DeHe LongChen Yi
